title: league of legends is not working because of pvp.net patcher kernal has stopped working
body:
my league of legends started not working from yesterday night when the pvp.net patcher kernal has stopped working appeared 
already tried the run administrator thing still does not work pls help!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

replies.body:
Hey noreplym8,

Can you ensure that you've added an exception to League of Legends to any antivirus applications that you may have running? Furthermore, you may want to try re-installing League of Legends and see if that resolves your issue.
